workflow.description: Workflow-based approvals working 'out of the box'.
workflow.name: WK Solicitud OC

initcondition.formula: isEmpty("Employee:Purchase Approver") = 'F' AND ( "Total" > "Employee:Purchase Limit" OR isEmpty("Employee:Purchase Limit") = 'T' )
isEmpty("Employee:Supervisor") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Employee:Purchase Approver") = 'T' AND ( "Total" > "Entity (Employee):Purchase Limit" OR isEmpty("Employee:Purchase Limit") = 'T' )

sendemailaction.body:
<br>Tienes un empleado {employee.entityid}  que requiere la aprobación de su solicitud de compra {tranid} .
 para aprobarlo. 

<br>Puedes revisarlo ingresando a: http://www.netsuite.com para aprobarlo.
sendemailaction.subject: Solicitud Pendiente de Aprobación {tranid}

initcondition.formula: isEmpty("Next Approver") = 'F' AND "Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND isEmpty("User") = 'F'

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Entry Workflow State Field
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next Approver

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Pending Approval Workflow State
workflowstate.name: Pending Approval

initcondition.formula: "Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND "Next Approver" IN ("Current User")
"Approval Status" IN ("Approval Status1") AND "Next Approver" IN ("Current User")

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Set Next Approver Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Set Next Approver

initcondition.formula: "Next Approver:Purchase Approval Limit" < "Total" AND isEmpty("Next Approver:Purchase Approver") = 'F'
isEmpty("Next Approver:Supervisor") = 'F' AND "Next Approver:Purchase Approval Limit" < "Total" AND isEmpty("Next Approver:Purchase Approver") = 'T'

sendemailaction.body:
<br>Tienes un empleado {employee.entityid} que requiere la aprobación de su solicitud de compra {tranid}. 

<br>Puedes ingresar:
http://www.netsuite.com to approve.
sendemailaction.subject: Solicitud Pendiente de Aprobación {tranid}

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.help: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next approver

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Approved Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Approved

sendemailaction.body:
Estimado:

El aprobador  {custbody_currentuser_hid}  aprobó tu solicitud {tranid}.

<br>Puedes revisarlo ingresando a: http://www.netsuite.com para aprobarlo.
sendemailaction.subject: Solicitud de Compra Aprobada {tranid}

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Rejected Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Rejected

sendemailaction.body:
Estimado/a: {employee.entityid}

El aprobador {custbody_currentuser_hid} rechazo tu solicitud {tranid}.

Puedes revisarlo ingresando a: http://www.netsuite.com.
sendemailaction.subject: Solicitud de Aprobación Rechazada {tranid}
